scopecontent.p: The collection contains two original volumes of abstracts of wills of Berks County, Pennsylvania presented to GSP by Alfred Smith, plus a photocopy of one of these volumes. There is also a photocopy of Charles R. Barker, A Register of the Burying Grounds of Philadelphia (3 volumes), and copies of some abstracts from Poulsen's.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
